title: Terror by Night 1946 (Crime, Film-Noir, Mystery, Thriller) directed by Roy William Neill

sources.title: Terror by Night 1946 (Crime, Film-Noir, Mystery, Thriller) directed by Roy William Neill
sources.description:
Murder, at 90 miles per hour!
When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

Original title: Terror by Night (1946) AKA: Sherlock Holmes: Terror by Night

This film is available with English, French, German, Italian & Spanish Audio.  And subtitled in many languages

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/CTCFtZYFyrc


Director: Roy William Neill
Writers: Frank Gruber, Arthur Conan Doyle
Stars: Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce, Alan Mowbray 
Genres: Crime, Drama, Literary, Film-Noir, Mystery, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with dubbed audio & subtitles)
01:21 Mystery unfolds as Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson embark on a train journey to protect a valuable diamond.
07:16 Investigation of a murder on a train involving the theft of a valuable diamond.
14:04 Investigation of a suspected murder and missing diamond on a train by Sherlock Holmes and Inspector Lestrade.
19:43 A murder and theft investigation unfolds on a train involving suspects and stolen jewels.
26:19 A detective investigates a stolen diamond and a murder on a train, encountering suspicious characters and complex motives.
37:52 Investigation reveals hidden compartment in coffin, implicating two culprits including Colonel Sebastian Moran on the train.
39:53 Murder investigation on a train reveals a hidden compartment in a coffin and a secret plot.
52:56 A mysterious criminal, Colonel Sebastian Moran, is identified on a train by Sherlock Holmes and Inspector MacDonald.
54:49 Detective Holmes uncovers a fiendish plot involving a fake arrest and a stolen diamond.


@CultCinemaClassics
